body: Good find. This is probably relatively straightforward, if you have any interest in tackling it. It probably consists of locating and extracting the relevant types and running them through lockPath. See https://github.com/golang/tools/blob/master/cmd/vet/copylock.go, https://github.com/golang/tools/blob/master/cmd/vet/testdata/copylock_func.go, and https://github.com/golang/tools/blob/master/cmd/vet/testdata/copylock_range.go.
